text: SK Vorwärts Steyr is an an Austrian association football club from Steyr, Upper Austria. ==History == The club was founded on April 14th, 1919. He is one of the oldest football clubs in Upper Austria. 1988 till 1996 they played in the Bundesliga. In 1999 the club went bankrupt and started again in lower leagues in 2001. In 2018 they were promoted to the Austrian Second League. In the 2022/23 season there were relegated sports teams for the first time since the last reform of the second division, including Vorwärts Steyr. In the last game of the season, the team lost 3-0 in a direct duel for relegation against their table neighbors FC Admira Wacker Mödling and had to move to the Middle Regional League after five seasons. == Current squad == As of 6 December 2021. ==Coaching staff== *Markus Eitl - head coach * Oliver Rockenschaub - assistance coach * Reinhard Großalber - goalkeeper coach ==Famous players== *Oleg Blochin * Željko Vuković * Tomislav Kocijan *Peter Stöger *Johann Kogler *Alexander Manninger *Daniel Madlener * Walter Waldhör * Andreas Heraf *Manfred Linzmaier *Richard Niederbacher *Christoph Westerthaler Category:Austrian football clubs Category:Football clubs of Upper Austria Category:1919 establishments in Austria
title: SK Vorwärts Steyr
